Author: GitHub
Description:
This week marks a moment of significant change for GitHub and the entire developer community. We announce that our CEO, Thomas Dohmke, is stepping down. We also have huge product news, as OpenAI's GPT-5 and Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.1 are both being integrated into GitHub Copilot. Plus, updates on TypeScript, Python, and much more.

#GitHub #GitHubCopilot #DeveloperNews

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 Welcome to The Download 00:32 OpenAI launches Open source models 01:23 OpenAI launches GPT-5, now available in Copilot 02:22 Anthropic releases Claude Opus 4.1, now available in Copilot 02:54 Announcing TypeScript 5.9 03:41 Python 3.14 reached its release-candidate phase 04:32 Why Mojo is taking developers by storm in 2025 05:14 Reanimated 4 stable release for React Native 05:49 MCP support is now generally available in VS Code 06:29 The GitHub Podcast: Unlocking MCP's power 06:55 Cool open source project of the week 07:24 JS13kGames competition is back 07:51 A leadership update: Thomas Dohmke steps down 08:18 This week's news recap
